header.label: NEWS
header.title: Latest Developments & Announcements
header.intro: Here you can follow all the innovations in our production, certification, and R&D processes at EMOF Teknoloji.

items.title: EMOF Teknoloji Commissioned New CNC Production Line
items.desc: High-precision production capacity for the aviation sector has been increased.

items.title: ISO 9001 & ISO 45001 Certification Process Completed
items.desc: Compliance with international standards in quality management and occupational safety has been achieved.

items.title: New R&D Project Supported by TUBITAK
items.desc: Studies on advanced titanium alloys for aviation structural parts have begun.
